text: Boutet de Monvel or Monvel may refer to: *Bernard Boutet de Monvel (1881–1949), French painter; son of Louis-Maurice *Jacques Marie Boutet de Monvel (1745–1812), French actor and dramatist better known as Jacques Marie Boutet *Louis Boutet de Monvel (1941–2014), French mathematician *Louis- Maurice Boutet de Monvel (1851–1913), French painter and illustrator *Roger Boutet de Monvel (1879–1951), French writer; son of Louis-Maurice
title: Boutet de Monvel
